short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically detects and records Google Meet and Zoom meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Google Meet and Zoom experience with this browser extension, designed to seamlessly integrate Talka.ai's features. Automatically record and analyze your meetings with ease.
